channel.title: How do i make npc's talk?
channel.description:
how do i make npcs talk??
[URL=http://img22.imageshack.us/my.php?image=imgssssss43545.jpg][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/61/imgssssss43545.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img22/imgssssss43545.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/imgssssss43545.jpg/1/w712.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

I think you are missing theese in your NPC.java: public int npcType; public boolean updateRequired; public boolean textUpdateRequired; public String textUpdate;
Just put them where the others are like this: [code]public class NPC {
public int npcId;
public int npcType;

    public int PoisonDelay = 999999;
    public int PoisonClear = 0;
public int absX, absY;
public int heightLevel;
public int makeX, makeY, moverangeX1, moverangeY1, moverangeX2, moverangeY2, moveX, moveY, direction, walkingType, attacknpc, followPlayer;
public int spawnX, spawnY;
    public int viewX, viewY;
public int HP, MaxHP, hitDiff, MaxHit, animNumber, actionTimer, StartKilling, enemyX, enemyY;
public boolean IsDead, DeadApply, NeedRespawn, IsUnderAttack, IsClose, Respawns, IsUnderAttackNpc, IsAttackingNPC, poisondmg, walkingToPlayer, followingPlayer;
public int[] Killing = new int[server.playerHandler.maxPlayers];

public boolean RandomWalk;
public boolean dirUpdateRequired;
public boolean animUpdateRequired;
public boolean hitUpdateRequired;
public boolean updateRequired;
public boolean textUpdateRequired;
    public boolean faceToUpdateRequired;
public String textUpdate;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's talk?

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:15, topic:266124”] if (npcs[i].npcType == 1234) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Melee king tests!!!”;
}
}

Try that code.[/quote]
same error[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2009, 09:56:50 pm[/size][hr]help!!!

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:13, topic:266124”]Make sure in this:

                if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Message here";
                    }
                }

You KEEP the quotes around your message or it will not work.[/quote]
now i get this

item.source: How do i make npc's talk?

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Make sure in this:

                if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Message here";
                    }
                }

You KEEP the quotes around your message or it will not work.

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?

@Setsuna wrote:

Replace “####” with the ID and ““Message Here”” with your message and then yeah, it should work.

item.source: How do i make npc's talk?

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:266124”]Yes, #### is the NPC ID.

Put it in the NPCHandler class, under your process() method. Scroll down and you may see codes like it.[/quote]
So id have to autospawn a person the put this in npchadnler.java
if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Message here”;
}
}
and then im done?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's talk?

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Yes, #### is the NPC ID.

Put it in the NPCHandler class, under your process() method. Scroll down and you may see codes like it.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?

item.description:
@Goran wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:6, topic:266124”] if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Message here"; } }

If you want to make it say it less often, change the misc.random.[/quote]
ok where does this go and ****= npc id?

item.title: How do i make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Message here"; } }

If you want to make it say it less often, change the misc.random.
